Image Assets

This directory should contain the following image files for the Boop documentation site:

Favicons

  • favicon.ico
  • favicon-16x16.png
  • favicon-32x32.png
  • apple-touch-icon.png
  • android-chrome-192x192.png
  • android-chrome-512x512.png

Social Media

  • boop-social-card.png (1200x630px recommended for social sharing)

Logo

  • boop-logo.png (for site header)

You can generate favicon files using tools like favicon.io or RealFaviconGenerator.

boop is maintained by kshehadeh. This page was generated by GitHub Pages.
